bio.Industry: UI/UX design, Product Design, Product Management
bio.Bios: Hi hi! My name is Alli, and I initiated spring of my second year with the Alpha Omicron class. In my free time, I love to dance, snowboard, go to the beach, and travel. A fun fact is that I have a deadly phobia of snails! Feel free to ask me about my favorite TV shows to binge watch, and why elephants are the best animals in the world â€” I can't wait to meet everyone!
